item.title: 32Gb vSphere Homelab stumbling block - Licensing dilemma
item.description: I upgraded my pc to a beefy spec just before Christmas. i7 4770s giving me 8 threads to throw at VMWorkstation and 16Gb of memory, along with my existing SSD. A quick reinstall of windows and install of VMWorkstation and I had a great lab to revise for VCAP-DCA510 in a hurry. However I had promised myself that I’d set aside Â£120 this month to max out my motherboard with another 16Gb.
